name: Derendian Moth Abomination
description: The Derendian Moth Abomination is a large creature with six tentacles and a beak, capable of telekinetically sprouting additional tentacles. It has a shimmering, colorful appearance due to its wings.
memorable: Its ability to teleport and leave behind a deadly dust cloud, along with the capacity to regenerate tentacles, makes it particularly dangerous.
goals: Typically hunts down foes and collects nutrients from fallen creatures by laying sticky masses of eggs.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other monstrous creatures or nocturnal ambushers in dark environments.
environment: Often found in dark, spooky forests or abandoned ruins.
strengths: High Dexterity, immune to cold and necrotic damage, and can bypass non-magical damage resistances.
weaknesses: Lacks ranged attacks and can be tactically outmaneuvered by alert enemies.
attacks: Attacks with its long-reaching tentacles and a powerful beak, capable of dealing significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Wings of the Primal Tender, which allows for teleportation and inflicts devastating effects on nearby creatures.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception score of 16, allowing it to detect threats effectively.
skills: Stealth is notable, with a skill bonus of +9, enhancing its ability to ambush enemies.
additional_information: Regenerates tentacles when enemies fall nearby.
Immune to being frightened and effects that reduce its movement.
Can use legendary actions to maintain combat pressure.
test_queries: massive creature with tentacles and a beak
monster that can teleport and regenerate limbs
dark forest predator with deadly dust cloud
mobile abomination that lays sticky eggs
tentacled monstrosity immune to cold attacks
